name: Django-pdm
tagline: A light framework for Product Data Management
body:
# django-pdm

A light framework for Product Data Management.

It is a minimalist and experimental project that aims to play with 

* workflow
* product data management

![django admin site](https://raw.github.com/esimorre/django-pdm/master/django-pdm.png)

It is based on 3 django apps:

* _lflow_: workflows management
* _pdm_: data and links management

Another application is provided: _test_app_ , a sample application.

**Keywords**: PLM , PDM , versioning , configuration management , Lascom , Windchill , PDMLink , Goflow
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
